entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 5:48 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
